docs.title: Welcome to Linson Philip's Portfolio
docs.text:
I am an Electrical Engineer specialized in Renewable Energy and Data Engineering.

View My Projects{ .md-button }

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
I am an Electrical Engineer with a passion for renewable energy systems and data-driven solutions. I specialize in power system simulations, data analysis, and optimization.

Key Interests: - Power System Design - Machine Learning Applications in Energy - Data Engineering and Analysis

docs.title: Digital Twin for Efficiency Filter
docs.text:
• Developed using LTspice and Simulink.
  • Achieved 95% accuracy in simulation results.

docs.title: Micro-PV Systems Monitoring
docs.text:
• Led data collection and analysis for PV systems.
  • Improved energy output by 10%.

docs.title: Key Skills
docs.text:
• Programming: Python, MATLAB, SQL
  • Tools: LTspice, Simulink, Git
  • Data Analysis: Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn
  • Soft Skills: Leadership, Problem-Solving, Teamwork
